## Matriz de PermissÃµes

| Workflow       | Job                      | Permissions                                    |
|----------------|--------------------------|------------------------------------------------|
| **CI**         | build-and-test           | `contents: read`                               |
| **CI**         | lint-security            | `contents: read`, `security-events: write`     |
| **CI**         | build-matrix-status      | `contents: read`                               |
| **Deploy**     | deploy-vercel            | `contents: read`, `deployments: write`         |
| **Deploy**     | deploy-notification      | `contents: read`                               |
| **Quality**    | codeql-analysis          | `contents: read`, `security-events: write`     |
| **Quality**    | dependency-review        | `contents: read`, `pull-requests: write`       |
| **Quality**    | type-check               | `contents: read`                               |
| **Quality**    | bundle-size              | `contents: read`                               |
| **PR**         | pr-validation            | `contents: read`, `pull-requests: write`       |
| **PR**         | pr-labeler               | `contents: read`, `pull-requests: write`       |
| **PR**         | size-limit               | `contents: read`                               |
| **Release**    | create-release           | `contents: write`                              |
| **Release**    | notify-release           | `contents: read`                               |
| **Nightly**    | nightly-build            | `contents: read`                               |
| **Nightly**    | dependency-update-check  | `contents: read`                               |

## Tempo de ExecuÃ§Ã£o Estimado

| Workflow       | Tempo MÃ©dio | Tempo MÃ¡ximo |
|----------------|-------------|--------------|
| CI             | 2-3 min     | 5 min        |
| Code Quality   | 5-7 min     | 10 min       |
| Deploy         | 3-4 min     | 7 min        |
| PR Validation  | 2-3 min     | 5 min        |
| Release        | 3-4 min     | 7 min        |
| Nightly        | 4-5 min     | 10 min       |

## Cache Strategy

```
â”Œâ”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”
â”‚         Cache Layers                â”‚
â”œâ”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”¤
â”‚                                     â”‚
â”‚  1. npm cache                       â”‚
â”‚     Key: package-lock.json hash     â”‚
â”‚     Restore: node_modules/          â”‚
â”‚                                     â”‚
â”‚  2. TypeScript cache                â”‚
â”‚     Key: tsconfig + files hash      â”‚
â”‚     Restore: .tsbuildinfo            â”‚
â”‚                                     â”‚
â”‚  3. Vite build cache                â”‚
â”‚     Key: vite.config + deps         â”‚
â”‚     Restore: node_modules/.vite/    â”‚
â”‚                                     â”‚
â””â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”˜
```

## Artifacts Gerados

| Workflow   | Artifact           | RetenÃ§Ã£o | Tamanho Aprox. |
|------------|--------------------|----------|----------------|

| CI         | eslint-results     | Sempre   | ~10 KB         |
| Nightly    | nightly-build-*    | 7 dias   | ~2 MB          |
| Release    | build-v*.zip       | Sempre   | ~2 MB          |

```
GitHub Actions
      â”‚
      â”œâ”€â”€â–º Vercel (Deploy)

      â”‚
      â”œâ”€â”€â–º CodeQL (Security)
```

**Este diagrama representa a arquitetura completa dos workflows configurados.**
